examples: The professor made mincemeat of the speaker at the conference.
The kangaroo was making mincemeat of him.
A couple of years in the army should make a man of him.
Good wine can make a meal.
The news really made my day.
words.defineEn: to form, produce, or prepare something, by putting parts together or by combining materials
words.defineVi: để hình thành, sản xuất hoặc chuẩn bị một cái gì đó, bằng cách đặt các bộ phận lại với nhau hoặc bằng cách kết hợp các vật liệu

examples: They enjoyed lively conversations over dinner in the cozy dining room.
Their conversation had been largely to do with work.
I prefer deep conversations that explore meaningful topics rather than engaging in shallow small talk.
To have a chat/a conversation/a discussion/a talk.
I pulled up a chair to join the conversation.
words.defineEn: a talk that is between two or more people and they tell each other about different things like feelings, ideas, and thoughts
words.defineVi: một cuộc nói chuyện giữa hai hoặc nhiều người và họ nói với nhau về những điều khác nhau như cảm xúc, ý tưởng và suy nghĩ

examples: There's a lovely park right on our doorstep.
She was a lovely woman and my mother truly enjoyed her company.
I have been as busy as a beaver these last few weeks crocheting up custom orders for some lovely customers.
They’ve let that lovely old house fall to pieces around them.
The rose was pink and had a lovely scent.
The days passed slowly.
The day brings a sense of vitality and liveliness to the world.
The news really made my day.
The hotel provides fresh towels for the guests every day.
Our car has seen better days!
words.defineEn: a period of time that is made up of twenty-four hours
words.defineVi: một khoảng thời gian được tạo thành từ hai mươi bốn giờ

examples: Today is Monday.
The lawyers put another nail in her coffin today.
The euro hit a record low in trading today.
I saw a famous actress at the shopping mall today.
All winter coats are half-price today.
words.defineEn: the day that is taking place right now
words.defineVi: ngày đang diễn ra ngay bây giờ

examples: The food looks good.
Good wine can make a meal.
Bad luck often brings good luck.
This information is as good as gold.
"Your guess is as good as mine."
words.defineEn: having a standard or quality that is satisfying
words.defineVi: có tiêu chuẩn hoặc chất lượng thỏa mãn

examples: My family and I look forward to the weekend every week.
They visit their grandmother every weekend.
Weekends are when I can work on personal projects.
They often visit their grandparents on weekends.
We often take weekend trips to nearby cities for sightseeing and relaxation.
words.defineEn: the days of the week, usually Saturday and Sunday, when people do not have to go to work or school
words.defineVi: các ngày trong tuần, thường là thứ bảy và chủ nhật, khi mọi người không phải đi làm hoặc đi học

examples: The garden looks nice.
The soft carpet feels nice under my feet.
The children were nice as pie.
This room would make a nice office.
The spicy sausage and mushroom fusilli had a nice kick of flavor.
words.defineVi: cung cấp niềm vui và hưởng thụ

examples: This young team is taking the veteran squad to the cleaners tonight.
The store will close at 9 p.m. tonight.
Tonight we have a delicious tofu stir-fry with fresh vegetables and a flavorful sauce.
The news won't be on tonight.
The restaurant reservation is for 8 o'clock tonight.
words.defineEn: the night or evening of the current day
words.defineVi: đêm hoặc tối của ngày hiện tại

examples: The mother gently cradled her newborn baby in her arms.
My mother pickled radishes with vinegar and spices.
My mother throws that far away.
This picture shows my mother as a young woman.
My mother has blue eyes and black hair.
words.defineVi: cha mẹ của một đứa trẻ

examples: Watch your mouth!
The girls watched the development of this relationship with incredulity.
A large crowd watched the game on Saturday.
Watch your head on the low ceiling.
Watch me!
words.defineEn: to look at a thing or person and pay attention to it for some time
words.defineVi: để nhìn vào một điều hoặc người và chú ý đến nó trong một thời gian

examples: Crime doesn't pay.
The crime of obtaining title to another's property by false pretenses.
In these traditional stories, no crime goes unpunished.
The crime was committed in broad daylight.
Crime rates are soaring and our public transport system is beyond a joke.
words.defineEn: an illegal act that is punishable by law
words.defineVi: một hành động bất hợp pháp bị trừng phạt bởi pháp luật

examples: My friend has been dealing with a lot of family drama lately, but I reminded her that we all have our crosses to bear and to take it one day at a time.
In a political drama, when a new scandal or revelation is exposed, the plot thickens as the characters must navigate new challenges and conflicts.
Getting involved in a toxic relationship may provide the thrill of drama and excitement, but it can also lead to emotional abuse, manipulation, and heartbreak.
By staying out of drama and avoiding negative talk, I've been able to maintain positive relationships with those around me.
This first diner overhears the drama right away.
words.defineEn: a play that is performed in a theater, on TV, or radio
words.defineVi: một vở kịch được thực hiện trong một nhà hát, trên TV, hoặc đài phát thanh

examples: I absolutely love your shoes.
His shoes were wearing at the heel.
My shoes are killing me.
She stole the shoes from under the assistant's nose.
I bought these shoes at half price.
words.defineEn: something that we wear to cover and protect our feet, generally made of strong materials like leather or plastic
words.defineVi: thứ gì đó mà chúng ta mặc để che và bảo vệ đôi chân của mình, thường được làm bằng vật liệu bền như da hoặc nhựa

examples: The purple flowers in the vase were beautiful.
My mom planted beautiful flowers in the front yard.
It's beautiful!
The train traveled through beautiful countryside.
The vibrant purple color of whinberries adds a beautiful touch to desserts like cheesecakes and tarts.
words.defineEn: extremely pleasing to the mind or senses
words.defineVi: cực kỳ dễ chịu cho tâm trí hoặc các giác quan

examples: The companies are two of a kind.
Thank you, you're very kind.
My aunt is a really kind sister to my father.
Thank you for your kind words, they made my day.
The lost child was helped by a kind police officer to find their way home.
words.defineEn: friendly and nice to others; caring about other people's feelings
words.defineVi: thân thiện và dễ mến với người khác; quan tâm đến cảm xúc của người khác

examples: The team's new manager brings ten years' experience to the job.
The new loan takes the total debt to $100 000.
The new president takes office in January.
Fans have given the band's new song their seal of approval.
The organization called the new regulations a turning point in the campaign against smoking.
words.defineVi: được xây dựng, phát minh, chế tạo gần đây, v.v.

examples: Bad weather brought chaos to the utility companies.
The weather was disagreeably hot.
The weather turned quite chilly in the afternoon.
The bad weather brought famine.
Good afternoon, the weather is perfect for a walk.
words.defineEn: the temperature and other atmospheric conditions such as sunshine, rain, wind, etc.
words.defineVi: nhiệt độ và các điều kiện khí quyển khác như nắng, mưa, gió, v.v.

examples: The brunch special featured a beefburger with a sunny-side-up egg, crispy bacon, and a dollop of hollandaise sauce.
That letter should go by special delivery.
They celebrated the special occasion with a beautifully molded aspic.
The chef's special included a tender beef fillet served on a bed of creamy garlic mash.
The bakery showcased a special maple sugar cake as the highlight of their seasonal menu.
words.defineEn: different from, greater, or better than what is normal
words.defineVi: khác với, lớn hơn hoặc tốt hơn những gì bình thường
